thread.title: Northern Lights shine across Middle Tennessee skies
thread.title_full: Northern Lights shine across Middle Tennessee skies

author: @WSMV
title: Northern Lights shine across Middle Tennessee skies
text:
Northern Lights shine across Middle Tennessee skies The NWS Nashville shared there were little to no clouds in the night sky, making it a great viewing experience for the G4 geomagnetic storm. Autoplay By Caleb Wethington Published: Oct. 11, 2024 at 11:35 AM CDT | Updated: 2 hours ago Email This Link
Share on Facebook
Share on X (formerly Twitter)
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
NASHVILLE, Tenn. (WSMV) - The Northern Lights shone brightly across Middle Tennessee on Thursday night.
The National Weather Service and many WSMV4 viewers sent in incredible pictures of the Aurora Borealis across Middle Tennessee.
The NWS Nashville shared there were little to no clouds in the night sky, making it a great viewing experience for the G4 geomagnetic storm.
Lots of photos across Middle TN of the #Auroraborealis tonight! We decided to give it a shot ourselves featuring a special guest, the radar! Considering the surrounding light pollution from Nashville, not too bad. You can learn more about the Aurora here https://t.co/cOAjeDBmkQ pic.twitter.com/dne3brrraD
â€” NWS Nashville (@NWSNashville) October 11, 2024
